content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Good afternoon, Mr. Li. Thank you for considering my apartment for rent. I understand that you are interested in the rental price. May I ask what your budget is for a 25 square meter apartment in this area?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 250 Euros per month. However, I am willing to negotiate. Please let me know the offer you have for me.

TERMINATE
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your budget, Mr. Li. Based on the current market rates and the size of the apartment, I can offer you a rental price of 300 Euros per month. However, I am willing to negotiate. What is your counteroffer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My counteroffer is 270 Euros per month.

TERMINATE
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your counteroffer, Mr. Li. Based on your offer, I am willing to accept the rental price of 270 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in this area. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
